title: Futbol Americas: Raúl Jiménez Out of World Cup Roster?
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar are joined by Mauricio Pedroza to discuss El Tri's 31-player preliminary World Cup roster. Who should be cut from the squad? Then Jon Champion joins the show to preview the MLS WCF between LAFC and Austin FC. Then the guys analyze Gregg Berhalter's MLS-based player training camp. Who was snubbed?
